Class Date

java.lang.Object
util.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
Represents a date with year, month, and day, and includes methods for validating the date, checking for leap years, and comparing dates. This class also provides constants for leap year and month length calculations.

  • Constructor Details

    • Date

      public Date()
      Default constructor that initializes the date fields to invalid values (-1).

    • Date

      public Date(int month, int day, int year)
      Constructs a date with the specified month, day, and year.
      Parameters:
      month - The month of the date.
      day - The day of the date.
      year - The year of the date.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the date is invalid.

    • Date

      public Date(String dateString)
      Constructs a Date object with a string in the format "MM/DD/YYYY".
      Parameters:
      dateString - A string in the format "MM/DD/YYYY".
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the string is not properly formatted or the date is invalid.

    • Date

      public Date(Date date)
      Copy constructor that creates a new Date object by copying the values from another Date object.
      Parameters:
      date - The Date object to copy.

  • Method Details

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Validates the date by checking if the month and day are appropriate for the year.
      Returns:
      true if the date is valid, false otherwise.

    • isDayValid

      private boolean isDayValid(int month, int day, int year)
      Validates the day of the month for the given month and year.
      Parameters:
      month - The month to check.
      day - The day to check.
      year - The year to check.
      Returns:
      true if the day is valid for the given month and year, false otherwise.

    • isBigMonth

      private boolean isBigMonth(int month)
      Checks if the given month is a 'big' month (having 31 days).
      Parameters:
      month - The month to check.
      Returns:
      true if the month has 31 days, false otherwise.

    • isLeapYear

      private boolean isLeapYear(int year)
      Determines whether the given year is a leap year.
      Parameters:
      year - The year to check.
      Returns:
      true if the year is a leap year, false otherwise.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Date targetDate)
      Compares this date to another date object.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      targetDate - The date to compare against.
      Returns:
      0 if the dates are equal, 1 if this date is later, and -1 if this date is earlier.
